title: ‘If it goes too easy, sooner or later you will be screwed’: Jumbo-Visma plans for life after Primož Roglič
content:
The Dutch squad can still rely on grand tour champions Jonas Vingegaard and Sepp Kuss, but it wants more riders to challenge for its leadership spots.

Read the full article at ‘If it goes too easy, sooner or later you will be screwed’: Jumbo-Visma plans for life after Primož Roglič on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
